title: Carrot cupcakes with white chocolate cream cheese icing
ingredients: ['For the icing', '50g (2 oz) white chocolate', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '100g (4 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon orange extract', '500g (1 1/4 lb) icing sugar', '2 tablespoons double cream', 'For the cupcakes', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '225g (8 oz) caster sugar', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '100ml (4 fl oz) vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g (9 oz) grated carrots', '125g (4 1/2 oz) crushed pineapple', '200g (7 oz) plain flour', '1 1/4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '100g (4 oz) chopped walnuts']
